text: walayin 'adhaqna al'iinsan niematan minaa min baed shdt wbla' lm yashkur allah teala, bal yatghaa wyqwl: atany hdha; li'aniy msthq lh, wama 'aetaqid 'ana alssaeat atyt, wdhlk 'inkar minh llbeth, waealaa taqdir 'ityan alssaeat wa'aniy sarje 'iilaa rby, fa'iina li eindah aljnt, flnkhbrn aladhin kafaruu yawm alqiamat bima eamiluu min syyat, walanudhiqanahum min aleadhab alshdyd
